Black Pudding.name: Gravity Crush
Black Pudding.text: The Pudding engulfs you and crushes you in a dark abyss.

Chuul.name: Wrap Maul
Chuul.text: The Chuul grapples you and voraciously tears away at your flesh with it's pincers.

Couatl.name: Mind Spike
Couatl.text: You feel an erie interruption in your mind, right before the immense pain.

Ettin.name: Double Smash
Ettin.text: It wasn't the first club that got you. It was the second one.

Ghost.name: Haunt
Ghost.text: The Ghost slips from the physical plane with an ear-shattering shriek.

Lamia.name: Blur Strike
Lamia.text: Before you can mentally understand the creature before you, you feel a blade sink deep into your flesh.

Red Dragon Wyrmling.name: Flame Jet
Red Dragon Wyrmling.text: The Wyrmling rears back and fires a jet of concentrated fire about you.

Succubus.name: Enchantress
Succubus.text: You think it is a good idea to run your blade across your neck...

Wereboar.name: Infected Gore
Wereboar.text: You blocked the hammer, but not the boar.

Weretiger.name: Flash Maul
Weretiger.text: You are attacked in a blinding flash, you block the daggers, but not the teeth... or the claws.
